title: Khloe Kardashian shows off trim figure in leggings
text: Share For added texture, the 32-year-old tied a plaid shirt around her waist. The Keeping Up With the Kardashians star tied her blonde hair into a tight bun and accessorized with a pair of shades. Workout wear: Khloe kept her figure covered in a black sweater paired with a set of leggings Keeping it away from her face! The Keeping Up With the Kardashians star tied her blonde hair into a tight bun Blocking the sun! She accessorized with a pair of shades The perfect touch: For added style, the reality star tied a plaid shirt around her waist That same day, Khloe took viewers behind-the-scenes of her workout. Also joining her was sister Kourtney and her three kids, Mason, Penelope and Reign Disick. Although made time to film her cute companions, the cameras turned on her as she engaged in a tough workout. In another snap, the ex-wife of Lamar Odom dragged a heavy item up a driveway and balanced on a balance ball while swinging ropes. That same day, Khloe took viewers behind-the-scenes of her workout. Also joining her was sister Kourtney and her three kids, Mason, Penelope and Reign Disick Roughing it! Although made time to film her cute companions, the cameras turned on her as she engaged in a tough workout Not giving up! In another snap, the ex-wife of Lamar Odom dragged a heavy item up a driveway and balanced on a balance ball while swinging ropes The reality star, who divorced ex-husband Lamar Odom in December, recently celebrated another event following the split. On Thursday, Kourtney enjoyed a cake with a mock-up of her new driver's license, which did not have her former last name of Odom. The address made sure to address her celebration, which read '13 Freedom Lane.'
